```{r, results='hide', echo=F, message=F, warning=F}
library(pmxmod)
library(pmxsim)
```

### Instantiate a dataset

Create a dataset of 50 subjects:

```{r}
ds <- Dataset(subjects=50)
```

Or shortly:

```{r}
ds <- Dataset(50)
```

Check how many subjects are part of this dataset:

```{r}
ds %>% length()
```
